title: All the Backlist! November 30, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including Cowboys Are My Weakness.
This week’s episode was sponsored by Book Riot Insiders.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
How Long ‘Til Black Future Month?: Stories by N.K. Jemisin
Still Life by Louise Penny
Open Season by Archer Mayor
The Museum of Modern Love by Heather Rose
The Bride Stripped Bare by Her Bachelors, Even by Chris F. Westbury
The Nickel Boys by Colson Whitehead
John Henry Days by Colson Whitehead
Deep Creek: Finding Hope in the High Country by Pam Houston
Cowboys Are My Weakness:Stories by Pam Houston
An Orchestra of Minorities by Chigozie Obioma
The Fishermen by Chigozie Obioma
Eating the Cheshire Cat by Helen Ellis
American Housewife: Stories by Helen Ellis
Southern Lady Code: Essays by Helen Ellis
Accident by Barry Louis Polisar
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
